document_name: Youth Employment and Migration Joint programme
Youth Employment and Migration Joint programme

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: By 2011, policy advice is provided to policy makers on the necessary reforms to tackle the informal economy, PPPs for youth employment are established, the employability of disadvantaged youth has been enhanced and an increasing number of qualified Albanian young graduates are employed in the private sector, contributing overall to the implementation and priorities of the National Action Plan (NAP) on Youth Employment.

project_descr: Youth Migration, reaping the benefits and mitigating the risks.
